blocks.subject: FW: PG&E drawing request
text: Dah? Is he kidding us? Dirk

blocks.subject: RE: PG&E drawing request
text: After discussion with one of our folks, who has experience with the CEQA
process, we feel that the narrative should provide what you need for our
part in the CEQA process.  If you need additional information regarding
this, please contact Mr. Gaylen Raymond at (559) 263-5239.
By the way, do we have a tentative date to meet again for around
mid-December? I will not be available on Fridays in Dec.

blocks.subject: >   PG&E drawing request
text: > Thank you again for the narrative of the proposed PG&E work on
> overbuilding the existing overhead line for the new 115kV circuit.  Can I
> still expect the drawing indicating the routing of the existing line
> sometime this week?  I need to have this info. to discuss your proposed
